name: Abby DuMoulin
text: We used to order once a week and had good pizza, hot most of the time... but this last experience was TERRIBLE! We waited over two hours to receive COLD pizza in smashed boxes. The store wouldn’t remake pizzas or do anything to try and help us. It was the worst customer service and pizza ever. We are so disappointed.

name: Snow Grimlin
text: They have great customer service and an awesome staff team. They have awesome food. I ordered wings and pizza and they came out perfectly as well as within a perfect time range. By far the best place to grab a bite of pizza or some wings.

name: Kara's Take
text: Amazing pizza. Friendly staff. I don't recall her name, but the female employee is really great.

name: Jana Berghoff
text: Pizza had great flavor and I think I really would have liked it but it came with no warmth at all.  I understand delivered pizza may not be hot but I do expect delivered pizza to be at least warm.

name: Laura Potter
text: We ordered pizza and  bacon sticks. The marinara sauce I had was a dark color. My husband's and daughter's sauces looked normal. Mine seemed to taste ok so I didn't think anything of it. 6 hours later I started having severe stomach cramps, vomiting, and diarrhea. 3 days later and I'm still sick. Last time we eat there.

name: Stephen Hirn
text: Great customer service. We got stuck in traffic on our way to pickup, they remade our pizzas without us even asking or thinking that might be a problem. Very polite staff make you feel like you made the right choice for pizza.

name: Sara Boklep
text: The wings were great and delivery was fast but they forgot my dipping sauce... I called to have someone run it over and they said they would... Waited for my sauce, ate room temp wings, sauce never came...

name: Carolyn Miller
text: I love this place. I agree that I’ve had issues sometimes just getting the sauces that I ask for, but other than that I’ve never had any issues. The quality of this place is so much better than dominoes, Pizza Hut or Papa Johns so im happy …More

name: Karen Pederson
text: Unique Pizzas! The pizza's get 5 stars.  (Tater tots with nacho cheese sauce, mac and cheese pizza).  They also have wings, which were a little soggy, which is a pet peeve of mine.  Didn't bother the others in my group.

name: Mark Shepherd
text: Great pizza. Website sucks. Keeps giving error without any detail.  Super frustrating.

name: Tony Leif
text: Tater tot pizza had slightly overcooked tots. They were chewy instead of crispy. Topper classic was real good. Buffalo pizza didn't have a strong Buffalo flavor.

name: Rita Sandstrom
text: It's close to us and the pizza is good, but their prices are high. We bought a medium tonight because they have a 1/2 online coupon. We paid $9.12 - which means that little medium pizza would have been almost $18 full price!

name: Adam Emanoff
text: So tasty! Tater tot pizza is the way to go. Delivery or pickup has been quick, but more importantly they're on time. Delivery guesstimate has been spot on, every time.

name: OrganizeQueen Consulting
text: These guys are horrible!!! We ordered twice online two differnt times, with both times this pizza being made wrong. We called to get them corrected amd were put in hold for 10 minutes and then the General Manager gets on the phone and hands …More

name: John Koscielski
text: The manager on duty on the night of 4/24/16 gave the best coustumer service i have ever had at a pizza place. He deseres a big raise never had such great service and food. #get this guy a raise!!!!

name: Dan
text: This is one of my favriot pizza places. but its the one i order the most because i only live about 7 minutes away. But recently, ive started seeing downs when having pizza here, and the pizzas fine but iv had some probloms with the dipping …More

name: Taylor Helgesen
text: Work at a pizzeria, think ours is better but this is still excellent and the delivery driver was on fleek being a little early and having crushed red pepper on hand.

name: Katy Friends
text: Toppers is a college go to. I first learned about it in LaCrosse, WI while I was in grad school. Minnetonka is a less likely location, but the quality remains the same if not better in this family owned location. If ever something isn't …More

name: Jeremy Peterson
text: Ordered online an hour before we wanted it, then waited for fifteen minutes in the store. They forgot our dipping sauces as well.

name: Noelle Gonzalez
text: Never got a chance to try because when I called to order the staff got in a yelling match so I bailed.

name: Justin Schultz
text: Great pizza and friendly environment.

name: Justin Smith
text: Management is great and topper sticks are good. However have ordered from this place multiple times and pizza never seems to be done completely.

name: Jack Carlson
text: Always satisfied with whatever I Order!! Keep it up!!

name: Brendan's Corner
text: Just not very good pizza. Nice staff though.

name: Georgia Begin, Esq.
text: First and last time I'll go here. Walked in to order they said it would take 25-30 minutes. 45 minutes later and we are still waiting, and they messed up my order. Meanwhile, the phone is ringing off the hook and even when the employees were not super busy, they didn't answer it- it rang almost the entire time we sat there.

name: James Finch
text: Great pizza and fast service

name: Kaia F
text: The best pizza around! Have it all the time!

name: Jami B
text: AWESOME FOOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: jami beaulieu
text: GREAT PIZZA!!!!!!!

name: Gary Lehman
text: thin crust---mmmmmmmm

name: TC ABAM
text: Always top notch service

name: Vince Brama
text: Great staff and manager.
